climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: This holistic mouthwash offers complete oral care, with 100% pure & natural ingredients such as Tea Tree, Peppermint, Fennel, Cardamom, Spearmint, Jasmine, Clove, Oregano, and vitamins D & E.
This small-sized, pocket-friendly mouthwash bottle supports effective oral care by promoting healthy teeth and gums, aiding in teeth whitening, and providing long-lasting fresh breath and taste.
Our 1-Pack travel-friendly mouthwashes comes in a 2 fl oz bottle that lasts for 300 rinses. With reduced packaging & water use, only 4 drops of this, mixed with water, are enough for one use.
Our mouthwash is free of solid preservatives, artificial flavors, & contains less than 1% alcohol in every swish. It includes Stevia, a naturally occurring, sweet-tasting, plant-based ingredient.
Proudly made in the USA with domestic and international ingredients, the Concentrated Mouthwash is cruelty-free and fluoride-free. The oral rinse is 100% safe for use by everyone aged 12 and above.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For me this is Awesome! Strong taste but it's a natural one. Don't know how I've not seen this before otherwise I would of been using this or even other brands that make & sell mouthwash this way. Only recently have some household name brands started selling concentrated style bottles but the effectiveness or ingredients just don't cut it. Thank you GuruNanda! 2 thumbs up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect ! A few drops is good to make more than enough. It is fluoride free and has clove oil which is magic for your dental needs amongst other great ingredients. I am going to buy this for all my loved ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely better than Listerine
reviews.reviewText: This right here has worked miracles and changed my oral hygiene for sure. It doesn’t leave a bad aftertaste to where you feel like you NEED to drink water after brushing your teeth. Definitely makes your teeth appear white and keeps the breath smelling good for a lot longer than traditional mouth wash. This, an electric toothbrush, good toothpaste, a tongue scraper and floss make a good oral hygiene routine. Do not sleep on this 😵‍💫

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A mouthwash i actually want to use
reviews.reviewText: I have a difficult time in the morning sticking to a solid dental routine and this product makes it so easy!! It is actually super easy and my mouth is fresher than when i use listerine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Small compact size great for travel. Flavor is good as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works totally trust me!
reviews.reviewText: This really whitens me teeth it just don’t happen overnight. It takes about two weeks to fully work but it’s the truth! BUT IT NOW!!!!!! And the essential oil is so soothing !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I wanted a more natural mouthwash that didn't come in a big plastic bottle. I bought this in July, use it every day and still have not ran out (it's mid January)! Best part of it is that when I went to my most recent dental appointment my hygienist said, "What have you been doing differently since your last check-up" Worried, I replied, "Nothing really. Why?" She said, "Your gums have noticably improved from your previous check-up." Relieved, I told her the only thing that changed was I switched to this essential oils mouthwash. She said, "Whatever you're doing, keep it up!" Strongly recommend this to everyone looking to improve their oral health!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My teeth feel so clean after using this product. Love it! The toothbrush was a nice surprise. I have gone back and ordered one of the toothbrushes for everyone in my house!

reviews.reviewTitle: Mouth feels nice and fresh after

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is amazing mouthwash not strong does not burn the guns like other mouth wash does

reviews.reviewTitle: An excellent alternative to chemical mouthwashes.
reviews.reviewText: I'm very concerned about my oral hygiene since I have a dry mouth issue. I’ve been using many mouthwashes in the past but with this one, after just one week of use, I can feel the difference. My teeth feel softer and my mouth hydrated a lot more than with Listerine, Crest, TheraBreath or even Biotène. This mouthwash will definitely replace commercial and chemical ones. I highly recommand this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Using this as a mouthwash. Need only a couple of drops in a cup. Fresh, minty flavout. Good quality.
I love the flavor and it cleans super well, my only problem is the lid, it either pops off by itself or it somehow gets so tight it won't come off at all..
